exceptions.exn: In environment num_Clients : nat x, y : label The term "x" has type "label" while it is expected to have type "name".

I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
num_Clients: nat

Goal:
forall x y : label, {x = y} + {x <> y}

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
label = fun (P : BaseParams) (LabeledMultiParams0 : LabeledMultiParams P) => let (lb_name, lb_msg, _, _, lb_nodes, _, _, label, _, _, _, _) := LabeledMultiParams0 in label : forall P : BaseParams, LabeledMultiParams P -> Type Arguments label {P LabeledMultiParams}
update_diff : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (sigma : A -> B) (x : A) (v : B) (y : A), x <> y -> update A_eq_dec sigma x v y = sigma y
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [num_Clients : nat |- Type] ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- Type]
name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}
lb_name_eq_dec : forall x y : lb_name, {x = y} + {x <> y}
update_eq : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (sigma : A -> B) (x y : A) (v : B), x = y -> update A_eq_dec sigma x v y = v
update_nop : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (sigma : A -> B) (x y : A), update A_eq_dec sigma x (sigma x) y = sigma y
update2 : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [num_Clients : nat |- Type] ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- Type]
collate : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> ?A -> (?A -> ?A -> list ?B) -> list (?A * ?B) -> ?A -> ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [num_Clients : nat |- Type] ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- Type]
Record MultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_MultiParams { name : Type; msg : Type; msg_eq_dec : forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; nodes : list name; all_names_nodes : forall n : name, In n nodes; no_dup_nodes : NoDup nodes; init_handlers : name -> data; net_handlers : name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg); input_handlers : name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg) } Arguments Build_MultiParams _ [name msg]%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope [nodes]%list_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
Record LabeledMultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_LabeledMultiParams { lb_name : Type; lb_msg : Type; lb_msg_eq_dec : forall x y : lb_msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; lb_name_eq_dec : forall x y : lb_name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; lb_nodes : list lb_name; lb_all_names_nodes : forall n : lb_name, In n lb_nodes; lb_no_dup_nodes : NoDup lb_nodes; label : Type; label_silent : label; lb_init_handlers : lb_name -> data; lb_net_handlers : lb_name -> lb_name -> lb_msg -> data -> label * list output * data * list (lb_name * lb_msg); lb_input_handlers : lb_name -> input -> data -> label * list output * data * list (lb_name * lb_msg) } Arguments Build_LabeledMultiParams _ [lb_name lb_msg]%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope [lb_nodes]%list_scope _%function_scope _ [label]%type_scope _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
update_nop_ext : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (sigma : A -> B) (h : A), update A_eq_dec sigma h (sigma h) = sigma
VectorEq.eq_dec : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), {v1 = v2} + {v1 <> v2}
Record NameOverlayParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_NameOverlayParams { adjacent_to : Relation_Definitions.relation name; adjacent_to_dec : forall x y : name, {adjacent_to x y} + {~ adjacent_to x y}; adjacent_to_symmetric : RelationClasses.Symmetric adjacent_to; adjacent_to_irreflexive : RelationClasses.Irreflexive adjacent_to } Arguments NameOverlayParams {P0} Arguments Build_NameOverlayParams [P0] _ [adjacent_to] _%function_scope
Bool.trans_eq_bool : forall x y z : bool, x = y -> y = z -> x = z
VectorEq.eqb_eq : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), VectorEq.eqb A A_beq v1 v2 = true < -> v1 = v2
distinct_pairs_and = fix distinct_pairs_and (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (l : list A) {struct l} : Prop := match l with | [] => True | x :: xs => (forall y : A, In y xs -> R x y) /\ distinct_pairs_and A R xs end : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> Prop) -> list A -> Prop Arguments distinct_pairs_and {A}%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope
refl_trans_n1_1n_trace : forall (A trace : Type) (step : step_relation A trace) (x y : A) (l : list trace), refl_trans_n1_trace step x y l -> refl_trans_1n_trace step x y l
refl_trans_1n_n1_trace : forall (A trace : Type) (step : step_relation A trace) (x y : A) (l : list trace), refl_trans_1n_trace step x y l -> refl_trans_n1_trace step x y l
StepOrderedDynamicFailure_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)), ~ In h failed -> In h (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net h = Some d -> input_handlers h inp d = (out, d', l) ->...-> step_ordered_dynamic_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedDynamic_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)), In h (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net h = Some d -> input_handlers h inp d = (out, d', l) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) l; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some d') |} -> tr = (h, inl inp) :: map2fst h (map inr out) -> step_ordered_dynamic net net' tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedFailure_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), ~ In h failed -> input_handlers h inp (onwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec h (onwPackets net) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net) h d |} -> tr = (h, inl inp) :: map2fst h (map inr out) -> step_ordered_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedDynamicFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), ~ In to failed -> In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d -> odnwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m d = (out, d', l) ->...-> step_ordered_dynamic_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedDynamic_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d -> odnwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m d = (out, d', l) ->...-> step_ordered_dynamic net net' tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> ~ In to failed -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net) to d |} ->...-> step_ordered_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
lb_name = fun (P : BaseParams) (LabeledMultiParams0 : LabeledMultiParams P) => let (lb_name, lb_msg, _, _, lb_nodes, _, _, label, _, _, _, _) := LabeledMultiParams0 in lb_name : forall P : BaseParams, LabeledMultiParams P -> Type Arguments lb_name {P LabeledMultiParams}
lb_msg = fun (P : BaseParams) (LabeledMultiParams0 : LabeledMultiParams P) => let (lb_name, lb_msg, _, _, lb_nodes, _, _, label, _, _, _, _) := LabeledMultiParams0 in lb_msg : forall P : BaseParams, LabeledMultiParams P -> Type Arguments lb_msg {P LabeledMultiParams}
label_silent = fun (P : BaseParams) (LabeledMultiParams0 : LabeledMultiParams P) => let (lb_name, lb_msg, _, _, lb_nodes, _, _, label, label_silent, _, _, _) as LabeledMultiParams return label := LabeledMultiParams0 in label_silent : forall (P : BaseParams) (LabeledMultiParams : LabeledMultiParams P), label Arguments label_silent {P LabeledMultiParams}
Name_eq_dec : forall a b : Name, {a = b} + {a <> b}
fin_eq_dec : forall (n : nat) (a b : fin n), {a = b} + {a <> b}
last_holder'_neq_unlock_extend : forall (tr : list (name * (input + list output))) (h : option Client_index) (n c : Client_index), last_holder' h tr = Some n -> n <> c -> last_holder' h (tr ++ [(Client c, inl Unlock)]) = Some n
last_holder'_input_extend : forall (tr : list (name * (input + list output))) (h : option Client_index) (c : Client_index) (i : Msg) (n : Client_index), i <> Unlock -> last_holder' h tr = Some n -> last_holder' h (tr ++ [(Client c, inl i)]) = Some n
last_holder'_input_inv : forall (tr : list (Name * (Msg + list output))) (h : option Client_index) (c : Client_index) (i : Msg) (n : Client_index), i <> Unlock -> last_holder' h (tr ++ [(Client c, inl i)]) = Some n -> last_holder' h tr = Some n
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_star_lb_step_execution : forall s : infseq (event (list name * ordered_dynamic_network) label (name * (input + output))), event_step_star step_ordered_dynamic_failure step_ordered_dynamic_failure_init (hd s) -> lb_step_execution lb_step_ordered_dynamic_failure s -> always (now (event_step_star step_ordered_dynamic_failure step_ordered_dynamic_failure_init)) s where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?labeled_multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- LabeledMultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams unlabeled_multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams unlabeled_multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams unlabeled_multi_params]
StepFailure_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), ~ In h failed -> input_handlers h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets h l ++ nwPackets net; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d |} -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') [(h, inl inp); (h, inr out)] where ?P0 : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailureParams ?P]
step_ordered_dynamic_star_lb_step_execution : forall s : infseq (event ordered_dynamic_network label (name * (input + output))), event_step_star step_ordered_dynamic step_ordered_dynamic_init (hd s) -> lb_step_execution lb_step_ordered_dynamic s -> always (now (event_step_star step_ordered_dynamic step_ordered_dynamic_init)) s where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?labeled_multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- LabeledMultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams unlabeled_multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams unlabeled_multi_params]
StepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)] where ?P0 : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailureParams ?P]
step_ordered_failure_star_lb_step_execution : forall s : infseq (event (list name * ordered_network) label (name * (input + output))), event_step_star step_ordered_failure step_ordered_failure_init (hd s) -> lb_step_execution lb_step_ordered_failure s -> always (now (event_step_star step_ordered_failure step_ordered_failure_init)) s where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?labeled_multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- LabeledMultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams unlabeled_multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams unlabeled_multi_params]
lb_input_handlers = fun (P : BaseParams) (LabeledMultiParams0 : LabeledMultiParams P) => let (lb_name, lb_msg, _, _, lb_nodes, _, _, label, _, _, _, lb_input_handlers) as LabeledMultiParams return (lb_name -> input -> data -> label * list output * data * list (lb_name * lb_msg)) := LabeledMultiParams0 in lb_input_handlers : forall (P : BaseParams) (LabeledMultiParams : LabeledMultiParams P), lb_name -> input -> data -> label * list output * data * list (lb_name * lb_msg) Arguments lb_input_handlers {P LabeledMultiParams}
lb_net_handlers = fun (P : BaseParams) (LabeledMultiParams0 : LabeledMultiParams P) => let (lb_name, lb_msg, _, _, lb_nodes, _, _, label, _, _, lb_net_handlers, _) as LabeledMultiParams return (lb_name -> lb_name -> lb_msg -> data -> label * list output * data * list (lb_name * lb_msg)) := LabeledMultiParams0 in lb_net_handlers : forall (P : BaseParams) (LabeledMultiParams : LabeledMultiParams P), lb_name -> lb_name -> lb_msg -> data -> label * list output * data * list (lb_name * lb_msg) Arguments lb_net_handlers {P LabeledMultiParams}
step_failure_star_lb_step_execution : forall s : infseq (event (list name * network) label (name * (input + list output))), event_step_star step_failure step_failure_init (hd s) -> lb_step_execution lb_step_failure s -> always (now (event_step_star step_failure step_failure_init)) s where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?labeled_multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- LabeledMultiParams ?P] ?failure_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailureParams unlabeled_multi_params]
